row.name: Website
row.description: A website consists of webpages, typically served from a single domain on the web.

row.name: urls
row.title: URLs
row.inlineHelp: It is recommended, but not required, to specify the various URLs, one per line, that your visitors use to access this website. Alias URLs for a website will not appear in the Referrers → Websites report. Note that it is not necessary to specify the URLs with and without 'www' as Matomo automatically considers both.

row.name: exclude_unknown_urls
row.title: Only track visits and actions when the action URL starts with one of the above URLs.
row.inlineHelp:
When enabled, Matomo will only track internal actions when the Page URL is one of the known URLs for your website. This prevents people from spamming your analytics with URLs for other websites.
The domain and the path have to be an exact match and each valid subdomain has to be specified separately. For example when the known URLs are 'http://example.com/path' and 'http://good.example.com', tracking requests for 'http://example.com/otherpath' or 'http://bad.example.com' are ignored.

row.name: keep_url_fragment
row.title: Keep Page URL fragments when tracking Page URLs

row.name: excluded_ips
row.title: Excluded IPs
row.inlineHelp:
Enter the list of IPs, one per line, that you wish to exclude from being tracked by Matomo. You can use CIDR notation eg. 1.2.3.4/24 or you can use wildcards, eg. 1.2.3.* or 1.2.*.*

Your current IP address is 127.0.0.1

row.name: excluded_parameters
row.title: Excluded Parameters
row.inlineHelp:
Enter the list of URL Query Parameters, one per line, to exclude from the Page URLs reports. Regular expressions such as /^sess.*|.*[dD]ate$/ are supported.

Matomo will automatically exclude the common session parameters (phpsessid, sessionid, ...).

row.name: excluded_user_agents
row.title: Excluded User Agents
row.inlineHelp:
Enter the list of user agents to exclude from being tracked by Matomo.

If the visitor's user agent string contains any of the strings you specify, the visitor will be excluded from Matomo.
You can use this to exclude some bots from being tracked. Regular expressions such as /bot|spider|crawl|scanner/i are supported.

row.name: excluded_referrers
row.title: Excluded referrers
row.inlineHelp:
Enter the list of hostnames and URLs, one per line, you want to exclude from referrer detection.

Each entry needs to contain the hostname and may contain a path. If a path is provided a referrer will only be excluded if the path matches as well. URLs with and without 'www' are treated the same. Provided protocols will be ignored.
e.g. "www.example.org" would match "http://example.org/mypath" and "https://www.example.org/?param=1" but not "https://sub.example.org/"

To also exclude all subdomains of a certain hostname, prefix it with a dot. e.g. ".sub.example.org" would exclude "http://sub.example.org/mypath", but also all its subdomains like "https://new.sub.example.org/".

row.name: sitesearch
row.title: Site Search
row.inlineHelp: You can use Matomo to track and report what visitors are searching in your website's internal search engine.

row.name: sitesearch_keyword_parameters
row.title: Query parameter
row.inlineHelp: Enter a comma separated list of all query parameter names containing the site search keyword.

row.name: sitesearch_category_parameters
row.title: Category parameter
row.inlineHelp:
(optional)

You may enter a comma-separated list of query parameters specifying the search category.

row.name: ecommerce
row.title: Ecommerce
row.inlineHelp:
When enabled, the "Goals" report will have a new "Ecommerce" section.
Matomo allows for advanced Ecommerce Analytics tracking and reporting. Learn more about Ecommerce Analytics.

row.name: disable_visitor_log
row.title: Turn off visits log and visitor profiles
row.inlineHelp: Also removes features that depend on these, like the e-commerce log, the segmented visits-log, the real-time map or the real-time widget. May be required to comply with local privacy laws/guidelines.

row.name: disable_visitor_profile
row.title: Turn off visitor profiles
row.inlineHelp: All visits-log related features always function.

row.name: Intranet Website
row.description: An intranet measurable is just like a website but hosted on an internal network.

row.name: urls
row.title: URLs
row.inlineHelp: It is recommended, but not required, to specify the various URLs, one per line, that your visitors use to access this website.
